vs.characteragent
Class AdoptedGoalSchema

java.lang.Object
  vs.characteragent.AdoptedGoalSchema

public class AdoptedGoalSchema
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper for GoalSchema when it is adopted by the Character agent: it gets a planner

Author:
swartjes
